branding.details: All templates use Preset brand colors (#00876f, #2dd4bf) and consistent styling

responsiveness.details: All templates include mobile-responsive CSS with media queries

accessibility.details: Templates include proper contrast ratios and semantic HTML

deliverability.details: Templates use inline CSS and email-safe HTML practices

recommendations: Test all templates across different email clients (Gmail, Outlook, Apple Mail)
Implement A/B testing for subject lines and content
Add unsubscribe links to all marketing emails
Create template versioning system for easy updates
